review: I had previously used the Roku 3 and a Sony Blu-Ray player (BDP-S5100) to add network capability to my TV. I have a Sony 7.1 channel A/V receiver and connected both through the HDMI ports. I got the Roku 3 mainly because I couldn't access my music in the Amazon Cloud with the Sony. Amazon Fire TV provides noticeably better picture and sound quality for all purposes.
